title: #358:  It's Not Rude... It's English
description:
Erika Jayne's basic instincts gets Dorit's panties in a twist, and we know it's only going to get worse from here. Come listen as we dissect every detail of this burgeoning feud. Then it's off to London where Caroline Stanbury takes a very important stand against fishing. Finally, we wrap things up with a visit to Atlanta and the trail of broken hearts/garage doors on RHOA.

Timecodes:

00:00:00 - Intro
00:08:39 - Crappens Mailbag
00:23:21 - Real Housewives of Beverly Hills
01:25:39 - Ladies of London
02:09:49 - Real Housewives of Atlanta
